title: 1014 The Secret to Manifesting Abundance
description:
“When we are grateful, we attract more things to be grateful for in our life!”

On today's 5-minute Friday, Lewis lets you in on two secrets of an abundance mindset. These simple truths can help you attract more wealth, business opportunities, romantic relationships, and confidence in your life!

Mel Robbins: The “Secret” Mindset Habit to Building Confidence and Overcoming Scarcity: https://link.chtbl.com/970-pod

Dr. Joe Dispenza on Healing the Body and Transforming the Mind: https://link.chtbl.com/826-pod

Master Your Mind and Defy the Odds with David Goggins: https://link.chtbl.com/715-pod
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
